level.text: 800.1 This chapter is promulgated pursuant to the Small, Local, andisadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance Act of 2005 (Act),ffective October 20, 2005 (D.C. Law 16-33; D.C. Official Code ยง 2-218.01 eteq.).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,623 (July 10, 2009).
